name: 罗杰·培根
bio_short: 英国中世纪哲学家和方济各会修士，被称为“奇异博士”(Doctor Mirabilis)。他是实验科学方法的早期倡导者，在光学（`roger_bacon_optics_1267`）和火药配方方面做出了重要贡献，并预言了未来的机械技术。
bio_short_en: An English medieval philosopher and Franciscan friar, known as 'Doctor Mirabilis'. He was an early advocate of the experimental scientific method, made significant contributions to optics (`roger_bacon_optics_1267`) and gunpowder formulas, and predicted future mechanical technologies.
